solution_line_template: Instead of ${original_cost} each, an Uno Giant Family Card costs ${original_cost} - ${discount_per_card} = $<<{original_cost}-{discount_per_card}={cost_after_discount}>>{cost_after_discount} each.
Ivan paid ${cost_after_discount} x {quantity_bought} = $<<{cost_after_discount}*{quantity_bought}={total_paid}>>{total_paid} for the ten pieces Uno Giant Family Card.
